TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceReference extends System.Object

summary.span: 註冊 Web 服務以便於網頁中使用。

span.span: Registers a Web service for use in a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要從 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 中呼叫 Web 服務方法，您必須納入 ASP.NET 網頁中的服務參考，並套用屬性設定為 Web 服務類別定義。To call Web service methods from ECMAScript (JavaScript), you must include a service reference in the ASP.NET page and apply the attribute to the Web service class definition. 如果您包含中的 Web 服務的服務參考或內 ASP.NET 頁面中，物件會具現化，在瀏覽器的 JavaScript 控制項。If you include a service reference to a Web service in the or control inside the ASP.NET page, JavaScript objects will be instantiated in the browser. Proxy 物件，將用於執行下列作業：The proxy objects will be used to do the following: - 在 JavaScript 中的非同步要求，到 Web 服務方法，Make asynchronous requests in JavaScript to Web service methods, - 初始化執行個體的 proxy 伺服器的資料類型，特別是使用做為叫用 Web 方法的輸入參數。Initialize instances of proxies of server data types, in particular for use as input parameters for invoking Web methods. > [!NOTE] > 控制項只可以用於相同的網域中的服務。The control can only be used for services in the same domain. 您可以藉由新增，以宣告方式定義的 Web 服務位置``項目``內的項目``項目頁面上，然後設定其屬性，如下列範例所示。You can define the Web service location declaratively by adding an `` element to the `` element inside the `` element on the page, and then setting its attribute, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` 您可以使用屬性，指出 proxy 產生指令碼是否包含在頁面中做為內嵌指令碼區塊，或取得個別要求。You might use the property to indicate whether the proxy generation script is included in the page as an inline script block or is obtained by a separate request. 您可以也以程式設計方式新增物件傳遞或是所使用的集合方法類別。You can also programmatically add a object through the or collection by using the method of the class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何在網頁標記中呼叫 Web 服務方法，從指令碼新增至 Web 服務的參考。The following example demonstrates how to add a reference to a Web service in the page markup to call the Web service methods from script. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute/CS/Default.aspx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.Script.Services.ScriptMethodAttribute/VB/Default.aspx#5)]

summary.span: 從可覆寫為自訂項目的衍生 物件提供 Proxy 指令碼。

span.span: Provides a proxy script from a derived object that can be overridden as a customization.
The proxy script.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `containingControl`參數是物件或所在的物件物件定義。The `containingControl` parameter is the object or object on which the object is defined. 它應做為基礎的相對 URL 解析。It should be used as a basis for relative URL resolution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `containingControl`參數是物件或所在的物件物件定義，應該用於做為基礎的相對 URL 解析。The `containingControl` parameter is the object or object on which the object is defined and should be used as a basis for relative URL resolution.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，以指出是否要將 Proxy 產生指令碼包含在頁面中做為內嵌指令碼區塊，以及個別要求是否能取得該指定碼。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the proxy generation script is included in the page as an inline script block or is obtained by a separate request.

value.span: 如果要將 Proxy 產生指令碼包含在頁面中做為內嵌指令碼區塊，則為 ，如果要以個別要求來取得 Proxy 產生指令碼，則為 。

span.span: if the proxy generation script is included as an inline script block in the page; if the proxy generation script is obtained by a separate request.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當未宣告屬性，則預設值為`false`。When the property is not declared, the default value is `false`. 當設為`false`，產生的 ECMAScript (JavaScript) proxy 的指令碼，會傳送至伺服器的其他要求下載為個別的指令碼檔案。When is set to `false`, the script for generating the ECMAScript (JavaScript) proxies is downloaded as a separate script file by an additional request to the server. 如果您使用瀏覽器快取，此選項時，很有幫助多個網頁會使用相同的服務參考。If you use browser caching, this option is helpful when multiple Web pages use the same service reference. 當設為`true`、 proxy 產生指令碼是包含為網頁中內嵌指令碼區塊。When is set to `true`, the proxy generation script is included as an inline script block in the page. 這可以改善伺服器效能，藉由減少網路要求的數目，尤其是在頁面中有許多的服務參考和其他頁面不會參考相同的服務。This can improve server performance by reducing the number of network requests, especially if there are many service references in the page and other pages do not reference the same services. 颾魤 ㄛ屬性必須設為相對路徑時設定為`true`。In addition, the property must be set to a relative path when is set to `true`.

summary.span: 取得或設定參考 Web 服務的路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the path of the referenced Web service.

value.span: 參考 Web 服務的路徑。

span.span: The path of the referenced Web service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可以指向只對本機 Web 服務。The property can point only to local Web services. 亦即，這個屬性只可以指向與啟用 AJAX 的 ASP.NET Web 應用程式相同的網域中的 Web 服務。In other words, this property can only point to Web services in the same domain as your AJAX-enabled ASP.NET Web application. 可以是相對，相對應用程式、 網域相對或絕對路徑。 can be a relative, application-relative, domain-relative, or absolute path. 如果屬性設定為`true`，則您必須使用相同的 Web 應用程式所在的頁面所指向的相對路徑執行個體。If the property is set to `true`, then you must use a relative path that points to the same Web application as the page that contains the instance.

span.span: The value of the property, if it is defined; otherwise, the value of the property for the class.
